title: Somebody hacked my account and is playing on it right now. Can I PLEASE get a rush response.
body:
ticker number #30643513
TWO-STEP AUTHENTICATION WOULD HAVE PREVENTED THIS.

Summoner Name: Kipsune

I can give the last IP logged (before the hack)
the last credit card on file.
People from my friends list.
The last password used.
The sign up email.

replies.body: Rest easy, we can assist with this!  I looked into your ticket, and I see that it's successfully been fielded to our account recovery team.  In the meantime, I've locked your account as a safety precaution so no more unauthorized parties can access it.  Our account team will get back to you as soon as possible, just hang tight!
thank you so much. I'm having a heart attack right now x.x
It's been two hours and no response. I'm afraid the email was changed on the account and they may have messaged to the hackers email :(

Hey, I know you're eager to get your account back but you have to sit tight.  We're a bit backed up and every time you reply to your ticket, you get knocked back to the bottom of the queue.  An account specialist will reach out to you as soon as they can.  We won't restore access to anyone unless we're absolutely sure it's being returned to the owner.  Patience friend, no more spammy!
BUMP BUMP BUMP BUMP BUMP BUMP
Sounds like you won't get banned for selling/sharing at least! Get yer act back!!!!!!
